task.title: Configuring AMF support for behaviors for HTTP response codes 307, 429 and 503
task.shortdesc: Use parameter linkOperationState of commands amfIntfSummary, amfLinkAdmin and amfMultiLink to enable the link operation state and command sbiTimersProfile to modify the SBI timers profile.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm amfIntfSummary --linkOperationState enable cmm amfLinkAdmin --linkOperationState enable cmm amfMultiLink --linkOperationState enable

plentry.pd: Default blacklist timer. This timer defines the duration that an NF service instance or remote endpoint is blacklisted when it is unavailable.
NRF access token service blacklist timer. This timer defines the duration that an access token service instance is blacklisted when it is unavailable.
NRF NF discovery service blacklist timer. This timer defines the duration that an NF discovery service instance is blacklisted when it is unavailable.
NRF NF management service blacklist timer. This timer defines the duration that an NF management service instance is blacklisted when it is unavailable.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm sbiTimersProfile modify --sbiTimersProfileListName <string> --sbiTimerName defaultBlacklist --sbiTimerValue <string> [ --sbiTimerUnit Second ] --sbiTimersProfileListName <string> --sbiTimerName nrfAccessTokenBlacklist --sbiTimerValue <string> [ --sbiTimerUnit Second ] --sbiTimersProfileListName <string> --sbiTimerName nrfDiscoveryBlacklist --sbiTimerValue <string> [ --sbiTimerUnit Second ] --sbiTimersProfileListName <string> --sbiTimerName nrfManagementBlacklist --sbiTimerValue <string> [ --sbiTimerUnit Second ]
